original: g.yas g.yas brkyang zhabs kyi blo ngan srid gsum nges par 'dzin cing chos sbyin mdzad la rtag tu rab btud bgyid//
analyzed: g.yas g.yas brkyang zhabs kyi blo ngan srid gsum nges par 'dzin cing chos sbyin mdzad la rtag tu rab btud bgyid//
translated: I bow always to the one who, with his right leg extended, tramples on the three worlds of evil thought, and who bestows the gift of Dharma.

original: na ga spyo_ _b+hu_ _shi ti_ng+ga_ tri_ b+hu ba_ na bi/_sha da_ lo ka d+harma sh+ta d+ha ram/
analyzed: na ga spyo_ _b+hu_ _shi ti_ng+ga_ tri_ b+hu ba_ na bi/_sha da_ lo ka d+harma sh+ta d+ha ram/

original: 'jig rten chos brgyad la sogs sa gsum dug sbyin klu brgyad rnams kyi yan lag rnams la rgyan char 'dzin/_/
analyzed: 'jig rten chos brgyad la sogs sa gsum dug sbyin klu brgyad rnams kyi yan lag rnams la rgyan char 'dzin/_/
translated: I hold the rain of ornaments on the limbs of the eight poisonous nāgas of the three worlds, such as the eight worldly dharmas.🔽ASTHALANKARANGITRI BHUBHANA APARADJATIMRI HUM JIDHARMA.

original: as+tha lang+ka ra ang+gi tri b+hu ba na a pa rda_ dza ti mr-i hum dzi d+ha ram_/_srid pa srid pa gsum gyi 'gro ba'i skye dang 'chi ba las rgyal rus pa'i rgyan gyis dbu dang phyag zhabs spras/_/sa gsum

translated: I am adorned with bone ornaments on my head, hands, and feet, victorious over birth and death in the three worlds of existence.

analyzed: nag po chen po'i bstod pa 'phreng 'dzin chos kyi nyin byed bzhugs so//

translated: Narahita🔽Rammapi🔽Rmadastha🔽Tshe🔽Tsho🔽Du🔽Du🔽Mar🔽Pi🔽Be🔽Ru🔽All the hosts of enemies who would harm you, cut them, cut them, cut them all, flesh-eating, blood-drinking demons!🔽Dhiravash🔽Mala-kriti🔽Bhosha🔽Shatuya🔽With garlands of illusion, adorned with limbs, destroy, destroy, destroy all the hosts of enemies!🔽Gila🔽Gila🔽Sakalota🔽Namodu🔽Dava🔽Gyib🔽Bhu🔽Dutharashe🔽Without remainder, I pay homage to the one who tames the evil by name.🔽Terrifying, terrifying, the one who terrifies body, speech, and mind,🔽

analyzed: bsrung zhig dge ba la sbyor 'gro ba bsrung zhing 'dzin mdzad chos kyi sku can khyod phyag 'tshhal/_/bde bde bde bde byu _b+ha_ nam swa_ sha_ pu_ si la kr-i tam b+ha_ ba_ na rbi_ la /_/_mo ga spyo mdzad dge ba la goms bde rgyas zhi dang grub pa'i dpal mdzad yangs pa'i mchog stshol ba/_/rigs kyi bla
translated: I pay homage to you, O Dharma Body, who is the supreme abode of vastness, who is skilled in the means of virtue, who increases bliss, who bestows the glory of peace and accomplishment.🔽I pay homage to you, O Dharma Body, who is the supreme abode of vastness, who is skilled in the means of virtue, who increases bliss, who bestows the glory of peace and accomplishment.

original: pa sbra ya nam ma pi ku la gu ru pa de dza pra pra snye_tam/_tshhe tshhe tshhe🔽ma'i zhabs sogs 'gro ba kun kyang legs par rab tu bkra shis nye bar gnas mdzad cing /_'tshho 'tshho 'tshho
analyzed: pa sbra ya nam ma pi ku la gu ru pa de dza pra pra snye_tam/_tshhe tshhe tshhe ma'i zhabs sogs 'gro ba kun kyang legs par rab tu bkra shis nye bar gnas mdzad cing /_'tshho 'tshho 'tshho
translated: I pay homage to you, O Dharma Body, who is the supreme abode of vastness, who is skilled in the means of virtue, who increases bliss, who bestows the glory of peace and accomplishment.

original: rgyu_ ya_ ma_ nam_ su_ ga_ _ta_ ba_ tsha_ na_ dr-i_spru_zla_ a_pa lpa_ tha_shu_/
analyzed: rgyu_ ya_ ma_ nam_ su_ ga_ _ta_ ba_ tsha_ na_ dr-i_spru_zla_ a_pa lpa_ tha_shu_/
translated: I pay homage to you, O Dharma Body, who is the supreme abode of vastness, who is skilled in the means of virtue, who increases bliss, who bestows the glory of peace and accomplishment.🔽I pay homage to you, O Dharma Body, who is the supreme abode of vastness, who is skilled in the means of virtue, who increases bliss, who bestows the glory of peace and accomplishment.🔽I pay homage to you, O Dharma Body, who is the supreme abode of vastness, who is skilled in the means of virtue, who increases bliss, who bestows the glory of peace and accomplishment.

original: mdzad bde bar gshegs pa'i gsung rab klog cing 'dzin pa'i yid can 'phags pa'i lam gnas dang / dz+wa dz+wa dz+wa be sha na nam pa ra hi te bi hi tam tam_ dza ga tram na ma mi/_no
analyzed: mdzad bde bar gshegs pa'i gsung rab klog cing 'dzin pa'i yid can 'phags pa'i lam gnas dang / dz+wa dz+wa dz+wa be sha na nam pa ra hi te bi hi tam tam_ dza ga tram na ma mi/_no
translated: Jva jva jva, the one who is always devoted to the welfare of beings,🔽Jaga tram namami.

original: phan dang mi phan skye bo skyong mdzad 'bar 'bar 'bar ba'i cha lugs can khyod gus pas phyag bgyi'o/_kye kye
analyzed: phan dang mi phan skye bo skyong mdzad 'bar 'bar 'bar ba'i cha lugs can khyod gus pas phyag bgyi'o/_kye kye
translated: I respectfully bow to you, O Lord of the Yakshas, who protects beings from what is beneficial and not beneficial, who has a blazing appearance,🔽Kye kye.

original: dpal nag po chen  po'i bstod pa 'phreng 'dzin chos kyi nyin byed bzhugs so//
analyzed: dpal nag po chen  po'i bstod pa 'phreng 'dzin chos kyi nyin byed bzhugs so//
translated: The Garland-Holder Praise of Glorious Mahakala, the Sun of Dharma

original: satwa na he ma ha ka la a ra ti bi ma ti to b+ha yo pa dra be b+h+yah/_mr-i tu
analyzed: satwa na he ma ha ka la a ra ti bi ma ti to b+ha yo pa dra be b+h+yah/_mr-i tu
translated: Satvanahemamahakalarativiamatito bhayopadravebhyah. Mritu

original: nag po chen po dga' bral log pa'i blo can sems can rnams kyi nyer 'tshhe'i 'jigs pa dang /_/nad dang ro go pa sarge byu a ri a hi ta kr-in+na ra karmo khru ka b+h+yah/_de ba yak+sha
analyzed: nag po chen po dga' bral log pa'i blo can sems can rnams kyi nyer 'tshhe'i 'jigs pa dang /_/nad dang ro go pa sarge byu a ri a hi ta kr-in+na ra karmo khru ka b+h+yah/_de ba yak+sha
translated: The one who removes the fear of harm, disease, and untimely death of beings with perverted minds who are detached from Mahakala,🔽Devayaksh

original: 'chi ba'i gnod pa phan bral dgra bo dang ni bdud kyi las la nye bar sbyor ba rnams/_/lha dang gnod sbyin
analyzed: 'chi ba'i gnod pa phan bral dgra bo dang ni bdud kyi las la nye bar sbyor ba rnams/_/lha dang gnod sbyin
translated: The gods, yakshas,

original: gra ha cu _pra ti g+ha ma na kr-i te_du_na ga te_ka ka rme_/_rnyi_ _pu_/
analyzed: gra ha cu _pra ti g+ha ma na kr-i te_du_na ga te_ka ka rme_/_rnyi_ _pu_/
translated: grahas, pretas, krittikas, nagas, kakramas,🔽and the evil spirits of the planets,🔽all with minds engaged in harmful actions,

original: gza' dang klu sogs gnod byed rab tu snang ba'i las kyi yid can mtha' dag kyang /_/khyod kyis dus dang tsha_ tsha sha_ ra_ da_ sha_ di_ shi ni_ twam_ ku_ ru_ sa_h+pha_ _ka_ lam/_bu_d+d+ha nam d+ha_rma
analyzed: gza' dang klu sogs gnod byed rab tu snang ba'i las kyi yid can mtha' dag kyang /_/khyod kyis dus dang tsha_ tsha sha_ ra_ da_ sha_ di_ shi ni_ twam_ ku_ ru_ sa_h+pha_ _ka_ lam/_bu_d+d+ha nam d+ha_rma
translated: you should subdue at the proper time and place,🔽and bring them under your control.

original: phyogs bcu kun tu zhi zhing rgyas dang bsrung dang skyabs pa nyid du rab mdzod cig_/sangs rgyas kun gyi dam🔽ma lo_ _sta ba_ pa_ _da_ ra tshi tam_ bi_rla utra_ ha_ tshi bye_/_d+ha _di_ t+ya
analyzed: phyogs bcu kun tu zhi zhing rgyas dang bsrung dang skyabs pa nyid du rab mdzod cig_/sangs rgyas kun gyi dam ma lo_ _sta ba_ pa_ _da_ ra tshi tam_ bi_rla utra_ ha_ tshi bye_/_d+ha _di_ t+ya
translated: In all ten directions, may there be peace, increase, protection, and refuge.🔽The supreme joy of composing these verses in praise of the Dharma protectors,

original: chos skyong la nye bar bstod pa'i tshhig gang bkod pa'i spro ba brtshon 'grus mchog_/sems can thams cad la
analyzed: chos skyong la nye bar bstod pa'i tshhig gang bkod pa'i spro ba brtshon 'grus mchog_/sems can thams cad la
translated: may all sentient beings

original: na tshi  pa ra hi ta ma na sa sarba satwe tu pany+tsha/_ya_h+phu_ _bye_ _te_ na_ la_
analyzed: na tshi  pa ra hi ta ma na sa sarba satwe tu pany+tsha/_ya_h+phu_ _bye_ _te_ na_ la_
translated: Nili🔽With a helpful mind, the sun of Dharma, named Benefiting Others,

original: ni phan pa'i yid can chos kyi nyin byed zhes byas gzhan la phan pa'i blos/_/bsod nams thob pa gang des sna
analyzed: ni phan pa'i yid can chos kyi nyin byed zhes byas gzhan la phan pa'i blos/_/bsod nams thob pa gang des sna
translated: By whatever merit I have attained through that,

original: b+ham bi bi d+ha hi ta su kham dz+nya na ta twa ma ya tsha/_sata she sha tri lo ke hi ta
analyzed: b+ham bi bi d+ha hi ta su kham dz+nya na ta twa ma ya tsha/_sata she sha tri lo ke hi ta
translated: May the remaining three worlds🔽Attain the essence of the two accumulations, the nature of benefit and happiness,🔽The object of aspiration of myself and all sentient beings,🔽Whatever it may be,

original: tshhogs phan dang bde ba'i rang bzhin bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi/_/smon pa'i gnas gang 'jig
analyzed: tshhogs phan dang bde ba'i rang bzhin bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi/_/smon pa'i gnas gang 'jig
translated: Sukhihitatasulajnasad

original: su_ kha_ ma_ hi_ ta_ tam_ su la_ ja_ sa_ da_ _/_dwi b+hu dza ma ha ka la
analyzed: su_ kha_ ma_ hi_ ta_ tam_ su la_ ja_ sa_ da_ _/_dwi b+hu dza ma ha ka la
translated: Divyajamahakal

original: rten gsum na rtag tu phan bde'i de nyid ye shes legs par thob gyur cig_/nag po chen po phyag gnyis pa'i
analyzed: rten gsum na rtag tu phan bde'i de nyid ye shes legs par thob gyur cig_/nag po chen po phyag gnyis pa'i
translated: May they always attain the essence of benefit and happiness in the three realms, the wisdom of the two accumulations,🔽The praise of the two-armed Mahakala🔽Stotram samputamiti

original: sto tram sa map+ta mi ti/_kr-i ti ri yo shri mat+na d+harma di t+ya sbra bi ra pa da na mi ti/
analyzed: sto tram sa map+ta mi ti/_kr-i ti ri yo shri mat+na d+harma di t+ya sbra bi ra pa da na mi ti/
translated: Kritayoshrismatna dharmaditya pravaradananamiti

original: bstod pa rdzogs so/_/ces pa 'di ni gnas brtan dpal ldan dam pa chos kyi nyin byed zhabs kyi sbyar ba'o/_/🔽de yo d+harmo yam pra ba ra ma ha ya na ya yi na ma ma ma ta pi tram pusbrang+ga ma sa ka la satwa🔽sbyin par bya ba'i chos 'di rab mchog theg pa chen po'i tshhul la gnas pa bdag gi pha mas gtsho byas sems
analyzed: bstod pa rdzogs so/_/ces pa 'di ni gnas brtan dpal ldan dam pa chos kyi nyin byed zhabs kyi sbyar ba'o/_/ de yo d+harmo yam pra ba ra ma ha ya na ya yi na ma ma ma ta pi tram pusbrang+ga ma sa ka la satwa sbyin par bya ba'i chos 'di rab mchog theg pa chen po'i tshhul la gnas pa bdag gi pha mas gtsho byas sems
translated: This praise was composed by the elder Palden Dampa Choekyi Nyinjé.

original: ga shi_ _ra_ nu_ta_ _shi ra sa_mya_k+sam_ bo_ rnyo_ _pha_ la_ la lta_ _ye_ tra_ /
analyzed: ga shi_ _ra_ nu_ta_ _shi ra sa_mya_k+sam_ bo_ rnyo_ _pha_ la_ la lta_ _ye_ tra_ /
translated: This Dharma to be given, the supreme Mahayana, may all my parents,🔽all beings,

original: can mtha' dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi 'bras bu thob par gyur cig//🔽dpal sa skya lo tsha ba shakya'i dge slong rigs sngags 'chang 'jam dbyangs
analyzed: can mtha' dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi 'bras bu thob par gyur cig// dpal sa skya lo tsha ba shakya'i dge slong rigs sngags 'chang 'jam dbyangs
translated: attain the fruit of unsurpassable perfect complete enlightenment.🔽The glorious Sakya Lotsawa, the monk of the Shakya lineage, the mantra holder Jamyang

original: kun dga' bsod nams grags pa rgyal mtshhan dpal bzang pos/_me mkha' rgya
analyzed: kun dga' bsod nams grags pa rgyal mtshhan dpal bzang pos/_me mkha' rgya
translated: Kunga Sonam Drakpa Gyaltsen Pal Zangpo,🔽in the fire-space year,🔽the year of the male earth monkey,🔽the month of the male fire tiger,🔽the fifteenth day, the day of the full moon,🔽the day of the constellation Pushya,🔽in the temple of the glorious Sakya,

original: mtshho lo dag pa'i gzhir bzhag nas lo drug cu bskor brgyad dang nyag ma nyi shu bsre
analyzed: mtshho lo dag pa'i gzhir bzhag nas lo drug cu bskor brgyad dang nyag ma nyi shu bsre
translated: Having set the basis of the pure lunar mansions, multiply by sixty, add eight, and divide by twenty.

original: ba kun 'dul ces bya ba me mo phag gi lo nag zla ba'i tshhes gcig gi nyin/
analyzed: ba kun 'dul ces bya ba me mo phag gi lo nag zla ba'i tshhes gcig gi nyin/
translated: This is called the “universal pacifier.” On the day of the first of the dark month in the female fire pig year,

original: mkhan chen chos kyi rje bsod nams lhun grub legs pa'i 'byung gnas rgyal mtshhan
analyzed: mkhan chen chos kyi rje bsod nams lhun grub legs pa'i 'byung gnas rgyal mtshhan
translated: at the behest of the great preceptor, the lord of dharma, Sönam Lhündrup Lekpa Jungne Gyaltsen

original: dpal bzang po'i bkas gnang ba bzhin/_dpal sa skya bzhi thog tu dag par
analyzed: dpal bzang po'i bkas gnang ba bzhin/_dpal sa skya bzhi thog tu dag par
translated: Palzangpo, this was written in a pure way at the glorious Sakya four-pillared temple.

original: bsgyur ba'o/ rgya skad ma dag pas da dung cung zad dpyad par bya rgyu yod do//_//
analyzed: bsgyur ba'o/ rgya skad ma dag pas da dung cung zad dpyad par bya rgyu yod do//_//
translated: Since the Sanskrit is not pure, there is still a little to be analyzed.

original: dpal nag po chen po'i bstod pa 'phreng 'dzin chos kyi nyin byed bzhugs so//
analyzed: dpal nag po chen po'i bstod pa 'phreng 'dzin chos kyi nyin byed bzhugs so//
translated: The Garland-Holder Praise of Glorious Mahākāla, the Sun of Dharma
